api.email_change_mail_text: You have requested an email change. Please verify your new email address by clicking the link below. If you did not request this change you can ignore this email.
api.verify_email_sent: Verification link sent to your email. Link is valid for 30 minutes.
api.email_sending_failed: Email sending failed. This could be caused by invalid email address or server error.
api.invalid_username: Invalid username. Username must be 2-50 characters long.
api.invalid_first_name: Invalid first names. First names must be 2-70 characters long.
api.invalid_last_name: Invalid last name. Last name must be 2-35 characters long..
api.invalid_domicle: Invalid domicle. Domicle must be 2-35 characters long.
api.invalid_preferred_full_name: Invalid preferred full name. Preferred full name must be 2-100 characters long and contain only letters from standard Finnish alphabet or following special characters: .-.
api.profile_updated: Profile updated. Some changes require you to re-login to take effect.
api.ratelimit: Too many requests. Please try again later.
api.maximum_tickets_reached: You have purchased the maximum number of tickets for this quota. If you have not completed your purchase, you can do so now.
api.sold_out: All tickets are sold out for this quota.
api.registration_closed: Registration for this quota is closed.
api.registration_not_open: Registration for this quota is not open yet.
api.not_enough_tickets: Not enough tickets available for this quota. Try smaller amount.
api.no_room_own_limit: You cannot purchase more tickets, as you have reached the event's per-user limit.
api.invalid_registration: Invalid registration. Maybe it has expired or is not valid.
api.pending_payment: You already have a pending payment. Please wait for the previous payment to complete before making a new one. This ensures that you won't be charged multiple times.
api.legacy_account_migrated: Your old Luuppi account has been linked to your new account, and you now have a member role!
api.invalid_answer_time: You cannot change your answers any more. If you need to make changes, please contact the event organizer.
api.user_updated: User updated. Some changes require the user to re-login to take effect.

mail_list.loop: LOOP: Events, partner announcements, and academic matters related to Luuppi

auth.accept_terms: I accept the terms and conditions

hero.description: Luuppi ry is the student organization for mathematics, statistical data analysis, and computer science students at the University of Tampere. Since 1969, Luuppi has been actively advocating for its members' interests and organizing leisure activities. It boasts the largest membership among student organizations at the University of Tampere!

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: We are proud to work with these companies. If you are interested in collaboration don't hesitate to contact us!

telegram.title: Join our Telegram
telegram.description: In the academic world, Telegram is a widely used communication channel, and Luupi has its own groups! Join us to stay updated on events and other current affairs.
telegram.new_student_group: Are you a first-year student? First-year students also have their own group annually, which you should definitely join! The updated link to the first-year student group can be found on the first-year student page at the beginning of the academic year!

pages_board.seo_description: Luuppi ry's Board and Officials in

pages_events.event_info: If registration is required for the event, it will be done through the old website. When you click the 'Register' button, you will be redirected to the old site.
pages_events.login_required: You must be logged in to register for events.
pages_events.quota_info: There are several ticket quotas for the event. Only the quota you belong to is shown as available to you.
pages_events.sold_out_info: Unfortunately, all tickets are sold out for the quota you belong to.
pages_events.max_tickets_bought: You have already bought the maximum number of tickets for this event.
pages_events.registration_closed: Registration for your quota is closed.
pages_events.unpaid_reservations: You have reservations that have not been paid yet. Go to your own profile to pay for them.
pages_events.no_tickets: This event does not have tickets for sale or require registration.
pages_events.unpaid_reservations_info: You have unpaid reservations. Please pay them before they expire.
pages_events.ticket_amount: Choose the amount of tickets you want to buy
pages_events.payment_failed_description: Your payment has failed. If you got charged, please contact WWW/IT representatives at webmaster@luuppi.fi
pages_events.payment_completed_description: Your payment has been completed. You will receive a receipt via email. You can now close this window.
pages_events.unanswered_questions_description: One or more of your unpaid reservations require additional information. Please respond to the reservation questions by pressing the "Details" button and completing the questions. Once you have answered the questions for all your unpaid reservations, you can proceed to make the payment.
pages_events.no_quota: There is no quota for your role in this event.

pages_404.title: Page not found
pages_404.description: Ooops.... The page you are looking for does not exist. Please check the URL and try again.
pages_404.seo_description: The page you are looking for does not exist. Page might have been removed or the URL is incorrect.

seo.title: Luuppi ry | Subject association for mathematics, statistical data analysis, and computer science students at the University of Tampere
seo.description: Luuppi ry is the subject association for mathematics, statistical data analysis, and computer science students at the University of Tampere. Luuppi has actively represented the interests of its members and organized recreational activities since 1969. With its membership, Luuppi is the largest subject association at the University of Tampere!

footer.description: Luuppi ry is the student organization for computer science, mathematics, and statistical data analysis at the University of Tampere.

pages_verify_email.email_changed_description: Your email has been successfully changed. Please log out and login again to finish the process.

pages_admin.user_general_info: You can search for a user by their email and view and edit their general information.
pages_admin.user_roles_info: View and edit a user's roles. Keep in mind that assigning roles does not affect a user's event registrations, even if you assign a role that is typically obtained by registering for an event.
pages_admin.user_required_info_missing: User is Luuppi's member but is missing required information!

pages_profile.username_explanation: Username is used to identify you on the website. It must be 3-30 characters long. Username can be displayed publicly.
pages_profile.first_name_explanation: All your official first names. This is information required by section 11 of the Associations Act, which will be verified upon joining the association.
pages_profile.lastname_explanation: Official surname. This is information required by section 11 of the Associations Act, which will be verified upon joining the association.
pages_profile.preferred_full_name_explanation: Desired full name. This is the name by which you will be called within the association. This could be, for example, a nickname or another name you wish to be called by. This information is used, for example, in seating arrangements at events.
pages_profile.domicle_explanation: Your official domicle. This is information required by section 11 of the Associations Act, which will be verified upon joining the association.
pages_profile.major_explanation: Your major. Select other if your major is something else than computer science, mathematics, or statistical data analysis.
pages_profile.legacy_migrate_info: You can link your old website's Luuppi account using this form. Enter your old website username and password in the fields below and press 'Submit'.
pages_profile.missing_required_fields: You are a member of Luuppi, but you are missing some required information. Please provide the missing details. Required fields are marked with an asterisk.

pages_feedback.title: Feedback
pages_feedback.description: Anonymous feedback is addressed in board meetings. The related discussion can be found in the minutes unless the feedback provider specifically requests otherwise. Feedback sent without contact information cannot be responded to personally.
pages_feedback.name: Your name
pages_feedback.subject: Subject
pages_feedback.seo_description: Send feedback to Luuppi ry anonymously or with contact information. Feedback is addressed in board meetings.

pages_error.title: Error
pages_error.description: An error occurred while processing your request.
pages_error.auth_description: There was an error during authentication. Please try again later.
pages_error.seo_description: An error occurred while processing your request.
